entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Becoming sunny late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
